Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.caravan.api

@Version("1.0.1") package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.caravan.api
Interfaces for usage of the Rhyme framework with other wcm.io.Caravan projects (e.g. JSON Pipeline)
See Also:
  • wcm.io.Caravan
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    CaravanHalApiClient
    An OSGi service that allows to request HAL+JSON resources for a specific upstream service using the CaravanHttpClient
    CaravanRhyme
    An alternative to the generic Rhyme interface that should be used for OSGi / JAX-RS projects.
    CaravanRhymeRequestCycle
    An OSGI service that will handle an incoming request to a server-side HalApiInterface implementation
